column4: someone tell me, is it possible to tell grub to boot an image ? for example opensuse dvd iso or something like that ?
ive seen it done in specific cases.. but  it still takes some work. and not always doable for just 'any' iso file
any howtos or tutorials ? i really dont have any dvds, and besides my comp even cant burn dvds
not really.  some live cd disrtos have that sort of feature. If you want to install ubuntu without a cd.. thats possible from a thumbdrive
